forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Scattered showers and thunderstorms. High 54F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 42F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Clearing late. Low around 40F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
